item.name: Max lag in messages btw follower and leader replicas
Requests waiting in the fetch purgatory
The average fraction of time the network processors are idle
The average fraction of time the request handler threads are idle

trigger.name: Number of active controllers in the cluster != 1
Number of partitions that dont have an active leader and are hence not writable or readable > 0
Number of under-replicated partitions (| ISR | < | all replicas |) > 0
The average fraction of time the network processors are idle < 0.3
The average fraction of time the request handler threads are idle < 0.3
